subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4720 is on the way

conversations.body_text: Okay thank you, but the duties are already included in the price I paid? Or i'll have to pay them when the pedals arrives?
I want to cancel the order, i ve seen i have to pay duties. I would like to reorder it using amazon, so that I will not pay additional costs

Hello again,

I saw on your website that because taxes are not included in the price, I
will have to pay them when the order arrives in Europe.

I would like to cancel order #SSN4720. I will reorder the item through
Amazon to ensure all taxes and duties are included in the final price.

Please confirm the cancellation.

Thanks,
Andrea Notari


Il Mar 16 Dic 2025, 12:18 service@simsonn.com
